ChangeGroups.Name: New Icons and Updates
Changes: Added icons for every. single. branding prop, as well as updated all existing branding props. Totaling over 11'500 icons alone.
Re-worked 'Colored with Props' style to have the same angle as all AIL icons.
Re-worked 'White & No Props' style to have the same angle as all AIL icons.
Re-worked all existing non-building icons to have the same angle as all AIL icons and improved brightness.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Icons and Updates
Changes: Added the 'Colored and No Props' style option, selected by default.
Remade all prop icons and update a few others from other categories.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Feature
Changes: Added an 'Icon style' option that lets you select between different styles of icons.
Added a white and color-coded with no props 'icon style'. This style includes a different accent color per building level.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Updated hundreds of icons with for various reasons, this includes updates to parking and park icons to help visibility.
Thumbnails are now refreshed when reloading into a save, in case you change options or want to refresh your custom thumbnails.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added icons for the Japan Region Pack.
Updated over 2000 icons for vanilla assets.
Added a few missing icons for some assets.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added icons for the 'Urban Promenades' CCP. ('Modern Architecture' assets all have thumbnails)

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Fixed normal and custom thumbnail folders being mixed up.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added support for custom 'Icon Packs'. Add a folder called 'AIL' in your mod's root, include prefab icons in it, and AIL will automatically replace prefabs' icons using the ones from your pack. These icons take priority over Asset Icon Library's built-in icons.
Fixed Custom Thumbnails not properly working with sub-folders.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added icons for the UK Region Pack.
Updated some icons for the French Region Pack that were not up to AIL standards.
Fixed the 'Overwrite Existing Icons' option not working properly.
Custom Thumbnails are now loaded from sub-folders too.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added icons for the German Region Pack.
Updated left-corner buildings' icons for the French Region Pack to face the correct direction.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Reworked the packaging method to improve the installation process of the mod.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added icons for the French Region Pack.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Compatibility with EDT and the 'Overwrite Existing Icons' option in AIL.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added 578 branding thumbnails.
Updated 703 prop thumbnails.
